column4: How can I see output of a command say some 5 lines at a time?
Secondly, how can I get system commands documentation?
check th man pages.. and check bash tutorial's for bash fetures.
for whatever command you are interested in..
Could you link me to bash tutorials?
google, or my links at delicious.com/dr_willis  theres 10000000's of bash tutorials out there
more then ive ever seen. :) proberly more then i could ever read
Thats fine. I would like to have documentation of system commandas
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/UsingTheTerminal ... It gives basic commands, but not system commands or other useful commands like initramfs
Can you help me on that?
all i can say is use google to search for docs ont eh stuff you are interested in.. theres no 'all inclusive' doc  for everything.
the same applies to just about any topic you would want to learn about really....
theres dozens of books written about bash.. and doezn more books written on system admin stuff
Yep.. agreed that commands as i said initramfs should have documentation
kk.. then could you suggest one//
